repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

did.unittitle: Jonathan Hafetz Papers on the Guantanamo Bay Detention Camp

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the Jonathan Hafetz Papers on the Guantanamo Bay Detention Camp is restricted.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Materials found in collection, provenance is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 2010.062.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Jonathan Hafetz Papers on the Guantanamo Bay Detention Camp; TAM 547; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Legal files and court documents regarding the case of Ali Saleh Kahlah Al-Marri.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection, which were created in 2005-2008, are expected to enter the public domain in 2128.
